from GP_STOCK_METADATA where DELETED_FLAG='0' order by STOCK_CODE

mapper.update:
update GP_STOCK_METADATA
STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_NAME = #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LISTING_DATE = #{listingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
TOTAL_STOCK_NUM = #{totalStockNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRADABLE_STOCK_NUM = #{tradableStockNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MARKET_VALUE = #{marketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRADABLE_MARKET_VALUE = #{marketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPD_KLINE_DATE = #{lastUpdKlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORIGIN_CODE = #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_DATE = #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFICATION_NUM = #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where STOCK_CODE_FULL = #{stockCodeFull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update GP_STOCK_METADATA set STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_NAME = #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LISTING_DATE = #{listingDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TOTAL_STOCK_NUM = #{totalStockNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADABLE_STOCK_NUM = #{tradableStockNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MARKET_VALUE = #{marketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADABLE_MARKET_VALUE = #{tradableMarketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPD_KLINE_DATE = #{lastUpdKlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORIGIN_CODE = #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPD_DATE = #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFICATION_NUM = #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where STOCK_CODE_FULL = #{stockCodeFull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
